scripts.build:wasm:production: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src emscripten/emsdk emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap","getValue","setValue"]' -s ENVIRONMENT=web -s MODULARIZE=1 -s 'EXPORT_NAME="rubiks"' -o ./src/rubiks.js ./src/rubiks.c
scripts.build:wasm:dev: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src emscripten/emsdk emcc -g -O0 -s WASM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap","getValue","setValue"]' -s ENVIRONMENT=web -s MODULARIZE=1 -s 'EXPORT_NAME="rubiks"' -o ./src/rubiks.js ./src/rubiks.c
scripts.build:wasm:node:dev: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src emscripten/emsdk emcc -g4 -O0 -s WASM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap","getValue","setValue"]' -s ENVIRONMENT=node -s 'EXPORT_NAME="rubiks"' -o ./src/rubiks.js ./src/rubiks.c
scripts.build:wasm:node:production: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src emscripten/emsdk emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap","getValue","setValue"]' -s ENVIRONMENT=node -s 'EXPORT_NAME="rubiks"' -o ./src/rubiks.js ./src/rubiks.c
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm:production && npm run build:bundle
